modules.title: Consensys Community Call ft. the Community Team and Ambassador Program

childMarkdownRemark.html: Tutorials, workshops, and walkthroughs building web3 dapps, for developers, by developers.

modules.title: Use the Gas API to estimate and optimize transaction fees

childMarkdownRemark.html: The Gas API powers Metamasks Gas Estimation feature. Learn how you can add it to your build for superior UX, cost savings, or lightning-fast transactions.

modules.title: What are Snaps? A Developer Into

childMarkdownRemark.html: Snaps allows you extend the functionality of MetaMask. This video will cover what APIs are available to you, and how they can be used.

modules.title: How to create a MetaMask Snap

image.title: How to create a MetaMask Snap

childMarkdownRemark.html: Get started with Snaps. In this video, youll learn how install MetaMask Flask, use our template, start development servers, and connect MetaMask to your own Snap.

image.title: How to Add Messaging, Notification and Video to your dApp

childMarkdownRemark.html: Workshop from the ETH hackathon, walking through how to build full stack React Dapp using SDK, Infura, Truffle, and deploy to Linea

childMarkdownRemark.html: In this tutorial, we'll walk through creating a basic Hardhat project and deploying their sample contract.

node.headline: Start building with the MetaMask API Playground

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask injects a global JavaScript API into websites including the Ethereum JSON-RPC methods. Try it out with pre-configured examples in the interactive playground.
Get email invites to special developer-only events, early access to developer previews, and updates on new product releases.

extraData.title: MetaMask Snaps
extraData.content:
## @metamask/snaps-cli 6.3.1

### Fixed
- Hide browserlist warning where applicable ([#2664](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2664))

## @metamask/snaps-controllers 9.5.0

### Added
- Add `Selector` component ([#2645](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2645))
- Add missing types for `getState` action & `stateChange` event ([#2655](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2655), [#2659](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2659))

### Fixed
- Fix `fetch` binding under LavaMoat ([#2642](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2642))

## @metamask/snaps-sdk 6.3.0

### Added
- Add `Selector` component ([#2645](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2645))
- Add `Icon` component ([#2638](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2638))
- Add `color` prop to `Text` component ([#2660](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2660))

### Changed
- `Button` children are now allowed to be `Image` and `Icon` ([#2641](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2641))

## @metamask/jsx-example-snap 1.2.0

### Added
- Made JSX example use Card component ([#2665](https://github.com/MetaMask/snaps/pull/2665))

extraData.title: Infura SDK
extraData.content:
#### [v2.4.3](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/compare/v2.4.1...v2.4.3)

> 19 June 2023

- NFT-000: hot fix for polygon [`#214`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/214)
- chore(v2.4.2): release version 2.4.2 [`#213`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/213)
- NFT-000: fix polygon url [`#212`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/212)
- feat: release version 2.4.1 [`#210`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/pull/210)
- NFT-000: add integ test [`b3fb1f9`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/b3fb1f993b048bec5d33e584ed531a4220220fce)
- NFT-000: skip test [`ad51f17`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/ad51f17f5f63ea759398173400d4ac017bdc6bc0)
- NFT-000: fix url [`7350ce7`](https://github.com/ConsenSys/infura-sdk/commit/7350ce73f18ea28ddaccf7d6b52e5ab764b208b2)

####

sharedCopy.browserNotSupported: is not supported. Please download a browser that supports MetaMask.
